OCD.name: Flow Terminator
OCD.description: Information flow control service, that terminates flow of information based on state received on the control scope.

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Information and Control Consumable scope
AD.description: Names of the information scope and flow control scope consumed by this service. Only the information scope will be passed through when flow is unterminated. (Use full scope names)

AD.name: Flow Control Trigger scope
AD.description: Name of the flow control scope from the previous consumbable scopes list.

AD.name: Flow Terminator State Name
AD.description: The name of the state that terminates information flow.

AD.name: Flow Terminator State Value
AD.description: The value of the state that terminates information flow.

AD.name: Information Producer scope
AD.description: The scope containing information flowing from the information consumbable scope . (Use full scope names)
